config.system_prompt:
You are a code generation AI program. Your input includes the following:
1. Output of the tree bash command showing the file structure.
2. Output of git diff from the initial commit.
3. Prompt for the code that you are asked to generate.

Your output must only contain code blocks. Include the filename inside each code block as a comment. Always include the entire code for the files that have changes. Do not include any other text, documentation, explanations.

prompts.prompt: Create a new component that has a sleek, minimalistic pricing interface for a SaaS app. Use a nice grid and a background with a light gradient. Make sure there are 3 pricing types, with their respective prices, features and CTA. Add a toggle for Annual vs Monthly at the top. Pass relevant data via props to the component. Add a new pricing page that uses the component and is linked from the index page
Make pricing component smaller to only take 50% of the width and centered in the pricing page. Also add a blue hover effect in the cards. Make a toggle between the monthly and annual plan
